DEVICE_MACHINE_TYPE - Variable in class information.DeviceSettingInfo

DEVICE_OUTPUT_MODE - Variable in class information.DeviceSettingInfo
0:As long as one unit of inverters has connect PV, parallel system will consider PV OK 1:Only if all of inverters have conected PV, parallel system will consider PV OK
DEVICE_OUTPUT_SOURCE_PRIORITY - Variable in class information.DeviceSettingInfo
0:UTILITY FIRST 1:SOLAR FIRST 2:SBU
DEVICE_PARALLEL_MAX_NUM - Variable in class information.DeviceSettingInfo
For KS and Plus Duo Series: 0: Utility first 1: Solar first 2: Solar + Utility 3: Only solar charging permitted For MKS Series 1K~3K: 0: Utility first 1: Solar first 2: Solar + Utility 3: Only solar charging permitted
DEVICE_PV_OK_CONDITION_FOR_PARALLEL - Variable in class information.DeviceSettingInfo
Only for 'KS' and 'MKS' 4k-5k: 00: single machine output 01: parallel output 02: Phase 1 of 3 Phase output 03: Phase 2 of 3 Phase output 04: Phase 3 of 3 Phase output
DEVICE_PV_POWER_BALANCE - Variable in class information.DeviceSettingInfo
0:PV input max current will be the max charged current 1:PV input max power will be the sum of the max charged power and loads power
